definition: to follow after/immediately afterwards
heel/to follow closely/to go with/(of a woman) to marry sb/with/compared with/to/towards/and (joining two nouns)
(chess) move/trick/all right!/(dialect) to add
to wear (clothes)/to contact/to use/to apply
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress

sentences.english: A ghost is following your girlfriend.
When the chicken crow, follow the chicken.
sentences.chinese: 鸡叫的时候，你就跟着鸡走。

sentences.english: His old legs and shoulders pivoted with the swinging of the pulling.
sentences.chinese: 他一把把地拉着，两条老迈的腿儿和肩膀跟着转动。

sentences.english: Red back home, light fire make life.
sentences.chinese: 红色跟着回家，人间烟火。

sentences.english: I holdopen the door and he walks in.
sentences.chinese: 我开了门，他跟着走进来。

sentences.english: The boys and girls danced to the disco music.
sentences.chinese: 少男少女们跟着迪斯科音乐跳舞。

sentences.english: But it’s hard, a bit like learning to sing by watching MTV.
sentences.chinese: 但这很困难，有点类似于跟着MTV学唱歌。

sentences.english: The hunter wnosked slowly in the forest! followed by his wolf-dog.
sentences.chinese: 猎人在森林里逐渐地走着，后背跟着一只狼狗。

sentences.english: I just followed his lead. But what was that?
sentences.chinese: 我就是跟着领舞的那个人。但这是什么舞？

sentences.english: The wire snapped at the wall plug and the light fused.
sentences.chinese: 墙上插座的电线短路烧断了保险丝，电灯跟着灭了。

sentences.english: Now, follow me. please. All right. Can you sing it now?
sentences.chinese: 现在，请跟着我。好的。你们现在能唱这首歌了吗？

sentences.english: Doctor zhao old kang to xing full hospital, also let go Li Zhongping followed.
sentences.chinese: 赵医生安排老康去兴满医院，还让黎仲平跟着一起走。

sentences.english: The students trooped behind the teacher into the museum.
sentences.chinese: 学生列队跟着老师走进博物馆。

sentences.english: I could only spare two or three hours, from my numerous diurnal occupations, to follow her footsteps .
sentences.chinese: 我只能从无数的日常工作中挤出两三个小时来跟着她。

sentences.english: He drives his own car everywhere and does not have a driver or security people around him.
sentences.chinese: 他都自己开车出门，也没有请司机或保全人员跟着他。

sentences.english: Samboy did the same as he had learned too.
sentences.chinese: 山博也学过，也跟着这样做。

definition: to follow
heel/to follow closely/to go with/(of a woman) to marry sb/with/compared with/to/towards/and (joining two nouns)
(onom.) smack!
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
in the same place/together/with/altogether (in total)
to take a look at/to examine/to survey/(coll.) pretty soon

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)
we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
hurriedly/without delay
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
to accompany/to keep sb company/to assist/old variant of 賠|赔[pei2]
thereupon/as a result/consequently/thus/hence
to catch up with/to keep pace with
but/however/(used for emphasis) indeed
to know/to become aware of/also pr. [zhi1 dao5]
(of an animal) to paw (the ground)
to run/to run away/to escape/to run around (on errands etc)/(of a gas or liquid) to leak or evaporate/(verb complement) away/off
